channel.title: Deadlocks on The Silicon Safari
channel.description: Recent content in Deadlocks on The Silicon Safari

item.title: Understanding Two-Phase Locking in Databases
item.description: Hey everyone, it’s alanturrr1703 back again with another blog! 😁 Today, we’re diving into the concept of Two-Phase Locking (2PL)—a fundamental technique used to maintain concurrency control in databases.
